author: gregor
msg: it is now possible to link into specific tabs in the info area from outside.
append lenya.tab=meta or another suitable tab. defaults to overview

author: gregor
msg: get real area. coincides with recent patch to show real area for info tabs

author: gregor
msg: #130 details of selected pages are not visible in MSIE 6.0
turns out IE can't handle <title/> even though that is valid XHTML transitional.
